title: Ashes
description: Daughter of a kingpin, I grew up destined to carry on the family line.My groom was picked. He's a sadist with a knife fetish.My wedding day was set. The dress is atrocious.It's just business, my father would say.I wonder what business has to do with being kidnapped and bound in my wedding dress, minutes away from walking down the aisle.ASHES is the 3rd book in the IGNITE series. It CAN be read as a standalone, BUT some characters are fleshed out heaps in the prior books, mainly the leads.
author: R.J. Lewis
